blocks.name: coeq0i
blocks.content: ~ coeq0 but without explicitly introducing domain and range symbols. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm coeq0i(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), emptycls))
} = {
  sylibr(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)), wceq(ccom(c0, c3), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)), emptycls))
  syl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)), wceq(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)), emptycls), wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)), emptycls))
  sseqtrd(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)), emptycls, cin(cdm(c0), c5), w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)))
  syl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)), wss(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)), cin(cdm(c0), c5)), wss(crn(c3), c5))
  3ad2ant2(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls), wss(crn(c3), c5))
  frn(c3, c4, c5)
  sslin(crn(c3), c5, cdm(c0))
  eqtrd(cin(cdm(c0), c5), emptycls, cin(c1, c5), w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)))
  ineq1d(cdm(c0), c5, c1, w3a(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls)))
  3ad2ant1(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fdm(c0, c1, c2)
  simp3(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c3, c4, c5), wceq(cin(c1, c5), emptycls))
  ss0(cin(cdm(c0), crn(c3)))
  coeq0(c0, c3)
}

blocks.name: fzsplit1nn0
blocks.content: Split a finite 1-based set of integers in the middle, allowing either end to be empty ( ` ( 1 ... 0 ) ` ). (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzsplit1nn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, cn0), wi(wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)))), wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)))
  elnn0(c0)
  ex(wo(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))))
  jaoian(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c1)))
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(nat1, cle, c0))
  nnge1(c0)
  simprr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wb(wcel(c0, co(nat1, cfz, c1)), wa(wbr(nat1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  nnz(c0)
  1zzd(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cz))
  nn0z(c1)
  elfz(c0, nat1, c1)
  fzsplit(c0, nat1, c1)
  syl5req(co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), cun(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  uncom(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))
  syl6eq(cun(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, c1), cun(co(nat1, cfz, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  uneq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, c1), emptycls, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  oveq1d(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1, nat1, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  syl6eq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat1, co(nat0, caddc, nat1), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  adantr(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(nat0, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(c0, nat0, caddc, nat1)
  0p1e1()
  syl6eq(co(nat1, cfz, c0), emptycls, co(nat1, cfz, nat0), wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  adantr(wceq(c0, nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cn0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cfz, nat0)))
  oveq2(c0, nat0, nat1, cfz)
  fz10()
  un0(co(nat1, cfz, c1))
}
